attributes.action: Stop any form of Postive discrimination
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of Postive discrimination policys in the UK is unlawful and as such the people of Northern Ireland applying for the PSNI can not be affect by one such policy. At present the PSNI is recruiting on a basics of 50% catholic 50% other however the Patten Report stated  50-50 recruitment policy for Catholics and Protestants.  Perhaps the Human rights board in the EU will be happy to stop this illegal activty.
